Text.Page:
Those blasted {@LinkCreature:8#4011#aberrant gulons} might be a challenge, even for you. They're down in the depths.

These freaks are immensely powerful and all evil. Whatever it takes to put them down for good, you do it!
I've heard of undead gulas before, but there's something about the gulons I can't place. Their strength, their power are amazing. How did they get like that?
